alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Amelia; Brunswick; Caroline; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Richmond; Dinwiddie; Essex; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; King William; King and Queen; Lancaster; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg; Middlesex; Northumberland; Nottoway; Powhatan; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 25 at 5:17PM EDT until July 25 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 503 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MARYLAND DORCHESTER SOMERSET WICOMICO WORCESTER IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 23 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA AMELIA CHESTERFIELD CITY OF COLONIAL HEIGHTS CITY OF RICHMOND GOOCHLAND HANOVER HENRICO POWHATAN IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA ESSEX KING WILLIAM KING AND QUEEN RICHMOND WESTMORELAND IN EASTERN VIRGINIA LANCASTER MIDDLESEX NORTHUMBERLAND IN NORTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA CAROLINE IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA BRUNSWICK DINWIDDIE LUNENBURG MECKLENBURG NOTTOWAY IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA ACCOMACK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA COURTHOUSE, ANTE, BEACH, BON AIR, BRAYS FORK, BRUNSWICK, BURRUSS CORNER, CAMBRIDGE, CARET, CEDAR FORK, CENTER CROSS, CHAMPLAIN, CHASE CITY, CHESTER, CHESTERFIELD, CHINCOTEAGUE, CHULA, CLANCIE, CLARKSVILLE, COLONIAL BEACH, COLONIAL HEIGHTS, CORBIN, CREWE, CRISFIELD, DAWN, DENARO, DRAGONVILLE, DUNBROOKE, DUNNSVILLE, EARLS, EDGERTON, GLEN ALLEN, GOOCHLAND, GREENBACKVILLE, GRESSIT, HORNTOWN, HOWERTONS, JETERSVILLE, KENBRIDGE, KILMARNOCK, KING AND QUEEN COURT HOUSE, LANCASTER, LAWRENCEVILLE, LEWISETTA, LITTLE PLYMOUTH, MANNBORO, MASCOT, MATTAPONI, MEADOWVILLE, MECHANICSVILLE, MIDLOTHIAN, MOSELEY, NEW CHURCH, OCEAN CITY, ONANCOCK, POWHATAN, PRINCESS ANNE, REAMS, RICHMOND, SALISBURY, SANDSTON, SCOTTS FORK, SOUTH HILL, TRIPLET, URBANNA, VALENTINES, VICTORIA, WARSAW, WEST POINT, AND WHITE PLAINS.
